text: Good Morning, Midnight may refer to: * Good Morning, Midnight (Rhys novel), a 1939 novel by Jean Rhys * Good Morning, Midnight (Hill novel), a 2004 novel by Reginald Hill * Good Morning, Midnight (Brooks-Dalton novel), a 2016 novel by Lily Brooks-Dalton * , upcoming film adapted from the Brooks-Dalton novel * "Good Morning--Midnight", a poem by Emily Dickinson * "Good Morning Midnight (Interlude)" a song by Janelle Monáe from the album The Electric Lady
title: Good Morning, Midnight
